mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LEAVE_REQUEST ( user_id AS userId, leave_type AS leaveType, leave_start_date AS leaveStartDate, leave_end_date AS leaveEndDate, reason AS reason status AS Status ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{leaveType}, #{leaveStartDate}, #{leaveEndDate}, #{reason} )

INSERT INTO test.LEAVE_REQUEST (approval_doc_id, user_id, leave_type, start_date, end_date, reason, created_at) VALUES (#{docId}, #{userId}, #{requestType}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{reason}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id FROM test.user u JOIN test.Ranks r ON r.rank_id = u.rank_id WHERE u.dept_id = #{deptId} AND r.rank_id = '4' LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test.approval_line ( approval_doc_id, approver_id, order_num, status, approved_at, comment ) VALUES ( #{docId}, #{approverId}, #{orderNum}, 'APPROVED', #{approvedAt}, null )
mapper.select: SELECT lr.approval_doc_id AS docId, lr.user_id AS userId, lr.leave_type AS leaveType, lr.start_date AS startDate, lr.end_date AS endDate, lr.reason AS reason FROM leave_request lr WHERE lr.approval_doc_id = #{docId}
